name: Simulated (MarcHansen, hayd3n)
description: The robots have taken over and want to purge all human life on Earth to return it to a state of peace where global warming or massive pandemics were no problems as the world was natural before us. You, one of the last survivors and must prepare yourself for nightmare a head of you so your team has prepared a very realistic simulation room for you to train against the robots in. It may feel easy at start but as it goes on the training will intensify even further beyond.
